response.summary: Msc. in Software Engineering. Currently working as a Software engineer at Superintendencia de Industria y Comercio of Colombia (Public Sector). Also commited with continous learning (currently Power BI, Machine Learning, Big data). Currently I am responsible for the thecnical leading on a software team, working  in a project related to Enterprise Content Management. This includes analyzing requirements, designing, writing / reviewing / approval of code (Java / Angular), configuration of pipelines for CI/CD in Azure Devops, etc.
response.skills: Java Certified Programmer, Scrum, Angular, NetBeans, PostgreSQL, Java, Spring Boot, GitFlow, Azure DevOps, Oracle SQL Developer, Eclipse, TypeScript, Java Enterprise Edition

profile_positions.description:
Along more than 5 years I have been committed with different projects and roles in this company. I am capable of assume responsibilities in any of the stages of the Software Development Cycle: Planning, analysis, design, coding, testing, implementation, capacitation, support, maintenance and evolution.

I have participated in the gradual transformation of the traditional software construction culture learning and adopting techniques from agile framework and DevOps in the process.

Currently I am technical leader of a team applying some SCRUM fundamentals and making a fluid work.
